languages.text: {n}Гладитор равнодушно кивает. То ли дурман и стимуляторы выжгли ему мозги, то ли ему просто все равно за кого убивать.{/n}
{n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps intoxicants and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гладитор равнодушно кивает. То ли дурман и стимуляторы выжгли ему мозги, то ли ему просто все равно за кого убивать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps drugs and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps drugs and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps drugs and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps intoxicants and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}那个角斗士无精打采地点着头，或许是药物与兴奋剂烧坏了他的脑子，也或许他并不在意谁指使他杀人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps intoxicants and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个角斗士无精打采地点着头，或许是药物与兴奋剂烧坏了他的脑子，也或许他并不在意谁指使他杀人。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}El gladiador asiente impasible. No sabes si es que los intoxicantes y los estimulantes le han frito el cerebro o si le da igual quién le ordena matar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps intoxicants and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El gladiador asiente impasible. No sabes si es que las drogas y los estimulantes le han frito el cerebro o si le da igual quién le ordena matar.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}剣闘士は無表情にうなずいた。酒や増強剤で脳がショートしたか、あるいは誰の命令で殺すのか気にしていないのかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps intoxicants and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}剣闘士は無表情にうなずいた。酒や増強剤で脳がショートしたか、あるいは誰の命令で殺すのか気にしていないのかもしれない。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Der Gladiator nickt teilnahmslos. Vielleicht haben Rauschmittel oder Stimulanzien sein Gehirn gekocht, vielleicht schert es ihn auch einfach nicht, in wessen Namen er tötet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps intoxicants and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gladiator nickt teilnahmslos. Vielleicht haben Drogen oder Stimulanzien sein Gehirn gekocht, vielleicht schert es ihn auch einfach nicht, in wessen Namen er tötet.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Le gladiateur acquiesce stoïquement. Soit les drogues et les stimulants lui ont grillé le cerveau, soit il est prêt à tuer pour n'importe qui.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps intoxicants and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gladiateur acquiesce stoïquement. Soit les drogues et les stimulants lui ont grillé le cerveau, soit il est prêt à tuer pour n'importe qui.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Gladyatör, ruhsuzca baş sallıyor. Ya kullandığı maddeler ve uyarıcılar aklını bulandırmış ya da kimin için öldürdüğünü umursamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiator nods impassively. Perhaps intoxicants and stimulants have boiled his brain, or he does not care at whose behest he kills.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gladyatör ruhsuzca baş sallıyor. Kullandığı maddeler ve uyarıcılar aklını bulandırmış gibi. Ya da kimin için öldürdüğünü umursamıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
